#summary Get Involved in Gaixie Micrite.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= What we are looking for? =
 * Source code and fixes contributions
 * Documentation assistance
 * Product and feature suggestions

= Where do I start? =
 * Download [http://code.google.com/p/micrite/downloads/list latest release], [InstallGuide install and run it].
 * Read documents in [http://code.google.com/p/micrite/w/list Wiki].
 * Check out source code from *[http://code.google.com/p/micrite/source/checkout SVN]*, [Building build it].
 * Discuss Gaixie Micrite with other people in *[http://groups.google.com/group/gaixie-micrite-dev mailing lists]*.
 * Post bugs and other issues in *[http://code.google.com/p/micrite/issues/list Issues page]*.
 * Fix bug and send patch to us.

----
== 我们下面的几项工作急需人手 ==
 * 代码编写与bug fix
 * 文档编写
 * 项目功能建议

== 如何开始? ==
 * 从Downloads页面下载 [http://code.google.com/p/micrite/downloads/list 最新版本], [InstallGuide 安装并运行它].
 * 阅读在[http://code.google.com/p/micrite/w/list Wiki 页面]里的项目文档.
 * 从 *[http://code.google.com/p/micrite/source/checkout SVN Check out]* 源代码, [Building 编译它].
 * 在 *[http://groups.google.com/group/gaixie-micrite-dev 邮件列表]* 中与其他开发者对Micrite的各个方面进行讨论.
 * 在 *[http://code.google.com/p/micrite/issues/list 问题报告]* 页面提交你发现的Bug，以及你希望的新特性.
 * 修改bug，生成补丁邮件发送给我们.
